article.description:
Marcus Bennett made seven 3-pointers and
finished with 29 points in Charlotte's 81-75 win over Fordham on
Saturday.
article.headline: Bennett's bombs boost Charlotte past Fordham
article.linkText: Bennett's bombs boost Charlotte past Fordham
article.story: NEW YORK (AP) -- Marcus Bennett made seven 3-pointers and finished with 29 points in Charlotte's 81-75 win over Fordham on Saturday. Curtis Withers had 15 points and 12 rebounds for the 49ers (16-9, 9-3 Atlantic 10), who trailed 34-28 at halftime. Charlotte was won five of its last six. Bryant Dunston scored 16 of his 23 points in the first half for the Rams (12-13, 7-5), who shot 46 percent from the field. Jermaine Anderson added 21 points and Marcus Stout had 16. Anderson converted a layup to give Fordham a 61-58 lead with 5:37 left, but Withers then scored six points in a 15-3 run that gave Charlotte a 73-64 lead with 1:18 to play. Fordham got within 75-71 with 34 seconds left but Bennett made four free throws to help the 49ers hold on. Bennett finished 8-for-11 from the field, including 7-of-10 from 3-point range. Charlotte shot 54 percent and outrebounded Fordham 29-28.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).
